title: How to write your SEO keywords in articles - Quora

response.answer_text: Keywords are the phrases that someone searches in the search engine to gain information. Whenever you’re writing an article make sure you don't use too many keywords, this process is known as keyword stuffing which comes under black hat SEO. Here you can use keywords in your article: 1. H1 tag: Place your keywords in the Heading tag H1 tag. 2. First paragraph: Always use your keyword in the first paragraph of the article. 3. In sub-headings: Use your keywords in the sub-headings. Make sure that the keyword density of your article shouldn't exceed more than 3%. You can calculate Keyword density using this formula- (Total No. of keyword appears in your article ÷ Total words in your article) So if your article is of 100 words & you are using your keyword 10 times, your density will be 10%.

First of all, it’s good to do keyword research and then pick the right one for your target audience. To rank in search engine, just do research on Google Adwords tool; write your content in a unique way. While you start writing, keep in mind that title, Meta tags, H1 tags are important. Think about a topic which your customer likes, write it originally. In the keyword planner, just check the volume of each keyword you can also use advanced tools like Semrush. Find related keywords- This related keyword can help to position your article in Google search results. Upniche provides a way to find the right keyword which also gradually increases the traffic to your website.
